casebody.data:
Hanna LAYTON and Linda Costas,1 Respondents Below, Appellants,
v.
Jackson P. LAYTON, Petitioner Below, Appellee. Nos. 87, 2018; 100, 2018;
125, 2018 Consolidated Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: August 17, 2018
Decided: October 23, 2018

--------

AFFIRMED.

The Court previously assigned pseudonyms to the parties under Supreme Court Rule 7(d).
